annotations.description: 337 Likes, 32 Comments - Jason | Barrelageddad (@barrelageddad) on Instagram: “When I want something refreshing vs spirit forward, the Mule is always an easy starting place.…”
annotations.title: Jason | Barrelageddad (@barrelageddad) posted on Instagram • Oct 6, 2019 at 2:46pm UTC

textContent:
2-3 cucumber slices
1.5 oz Mezcal
.5 oz Triple Sec
.5 oz Lime Juice
Ginger beer [top]
Chili powder

Shake all but ginger beer and chili and dump into mug
Top with ginger beer and add a top of chili powder
Garnish with cucumber and ginger

title: El Jefe
